Container.Name: ImmichKiosk
Container.Overview: Immich Kiosk is a lightweight slideshow for running on kiosk devices and browsers that uses Immich as a data source.
Container.Requires: A reachable Immich server that is running version v1.127.0 or above. See the project page for more information: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk?tab=readme-ov-file
Container.DonateText: If this project has been helpful to you and you wish to support me, you can do so with the link below ðŸ™‚.

Config.Name: Language
Config.Description: The language code for Kiosk to use

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: The timezone for Kiosk to use

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 3000

Config.Name: Config File
Config.Description: Config file for application. Remove this if using environmental variables instead.

Config.Name: Immich Api Key
Config.Description: The API for your Immich server.

Config.Name: Immich Url
Config.Description: The URL of your Immich server. MUST include a port if one is needed e.g. `http://192.168.1.123:2283`.

Config.Name: Immich External Url
Config.Description: The public URL of your Immich server used for generating links and QR codes.

Config.Name: Show Time
Config.Description: Display clock.

Config.Name: Time Format
Config.Description: Display clock time in either 12-hour or 24-hour format. This can either be 12 or 24.

Config.Name: Show Date
Config.Description: Display the date.

Config.Name: Date Format
Config.Description: The format of the date. default is day/month/year.

Config.Name: Clock Source
Config.Description: The source of the clock. Either client or server.

Config.Name: Duration
Config.Description: The amount in seconds an image will be displayed for.

Config.Name: Disable Screensaver
Config.Description: Ask browser to request a lock that prevents device screens from dimming or locking. NOTE: I haven't been able to get this to work consistently on IOS.

Config.Name: Optimize Images
Config.Description: Whether Kiosk should resize images to match your browser screen dimensions for better performance. NOTE: In most cases this is not necessary, but if you are accessing Kiosk on a low-powered device, this may help.

Config.Name: Use Gpu
Config.Description: Enable GPU acceleration for improved performance (e.g., CSS transforms)

Config.Name: Show Archived
Config.Description: Allow assets marked as archived to be displayed.

Config.Name: Albums
Config.Description: The ID(s) of one or more albums to display.

Config.Name: Album Order
Config.Description: The order an album's assets will be displayed.

Config.Name: Excluded Albums
Config.Description: The ID(s) of a specific album or albums you want to exclude.

Config.Name: Album Video
Config.Description: Enable video playback for albums.

Config.Name: Live Photos
Config.Description: Enable live photos playback for albums.

Config.Name: Live Photo Loop Delay
Config.Description: Delay in milliseconds before looping live photos.

Config.Name: People
Config.Description: The ID(s) of a specific person or people you want to display.

Config.Name: Require All People
Config.Description: Require all people to be present in an asset.

Config.Name: Excluded People
Config.Description: The ID(s) of a specific person or people you want to exclude.

Config.Name: Dates
Config.Description: A date range or ranges.

Config.Name: Tags
Config.Description: Tag or tags you want to display.

Config.Name: Memories
Config.Description: Display memories.

Config.Name: Blacklist
Config.Description: The ID(s) of any specific assets you want Kiosk to skip/exclude from displaying.

Config.Name: Date Filter
Config.Description: Filter person and random assets by date.

Config.Name: Disable Navigation
Config.Description: Disable all Kiosk's navigation (touch/click, keyboard and menu).

Config.Name: Disable Ui
Config.Description: A shortcut to set show_time, show_date, show_image_time and show_image_date to false.

Config.Name: Menu Position
Config.Description: Sets the position of the menu bar.

Config.Name: Frameless
Config.Description: Remove borders and rounded corners on images.

Config.Name: Hide Cursor
Config.Description: Hide cursor/mouse via CSS.

Config.Name: Font Size
Config.Description: The base font size for Kiosk. Default is 100% (16px). DO NOT include the % character.

Config.Name: Background Blur
Config.Description: Display a blurred version of the image as a background.

Config.Name: Background Blur Amount
Config.Description: The amount of blur to apply to the background image (sigma).

Config.Name: Theme
Config.Description: Which theme to use.

Config.Name: Layout
Config.Description: Which layout to use.

Config.Name: Sleep Start
Config.Description: Time (in 24hr format) to start sleep mode.

Config.Name: Sleep End
Config.Description: Time (in 24hr format) to end sleep mode.

Config.Name: Sleep Icon
Config.Description: Display icon during sleep mode.

Config.Name: Sleep Dim Screen
Config.Description: Dim screen during sleep mode when using Fully Kiosk Browser.

Config.Name: Transition
Config.Description: Which transition to use when changing images.

Config.Name: Fade Transition Duration
Config.Description: The duration of the fade (in seconds) transition.

Config.Name: Cross Fade Transition Duration
Config.Description: The duration of the cross-fade (in seconds) transition.

Config.Name: Show Progress Bar
Config.Description: Display a progress bar for when image will refresh.

Config.Name: Progress Bar Position
Config.Description: Sets the position of the progress bar.

Config.Name: Image Fit
Config.Description: How the image should fit on the screen. Default is "contain".

Config.Name: Image Effect
Config.Description: Add an effect to images.

Config.Name: Image Effect Amount
Config.Description: Set the intensity of the image effect. Use a number between 100 (minimum) and higher, without the % symbol.

Config.Name: Use Original Image
Config.Description: Use the original image. NOTE: If the original is not a png, gif, jpeg or webp Kiosk will fall back to using the preview.

Config.Name: Show Owner
Config.Description: Display the asset owner. Useful for shared albums.

Config.Name: Show Album Name
Config.Description: Display album names that the asset appears in.

Config.Name: Show Person Name
Config.Description: Display people's names.

Config.Name: Show Person Age
Config.Description: Display people's ages.

Config.Name: Show Image Time
Config.Description: Display image time from METADATA (if available).

Config.Name: Image Time Format
Config.Description: Display image time in either 12-hour or 24-hour format. This can either be 12 or 24.

Config.Name: Show Image Date
Config.Description: Display the image date from METADATA (if available).

Config.Name: Image Date Format
Config.Description: The format of the image date. default is day/month/year.

Config.Name: Show Image Description
Config.Description: Display image description from METADATA (if available).

Config.Name: Show Image Exif
Config.Description: Display image Fnumber, Shutter speed, focal length, ISO from METADATA (if available).

Config.Name: Show Image Location
Config.Description: Display the image location from METADATA (if available).

Config.Name: Show Image Qr
Config.Description: Displays a QR code linking to the original image (in Immich) next to the image metadata.

Config.Name: Hide Countries
Config.Description: List of countries to hide from image_location

Config.Name: Show More Info
Config.Description: Enables the display of additional information about the current image(s)

Config.Name: Show More Info Image Link
Config.Description: Shows a link to the original image (in Immich) in the additional information overlay

Config.Name: Show More Info Qr Code
Config.Description: Displays a QR code linking to the original image (in Immich) in the additional information overlay

Config.Name: Like Button Action
Config.Description: Action(s) to perform when the like button is clicked. Supported actions are [favorite, album].

Config.Name: Hide Button Action
Config.Description: Action(s) to perform when the hide button is clicked. Supported actions are [tag, archive].

Config.Name: Show User
Config.Description: Display the user used to fetch the image.

Config.Name: Use Offline Mode
Config.Description: Enable offline mode for the device.

Config.Name: Iframe
Config.Description: Add iframes into Kiosk.

Config.Name: Config Validation Level
Config.Description: The level of validation to perform on the config.yaml file.

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Which port Kiosk should use. NOTE: This is only typically needed when running Kiosk outside of a container. If you are running inside a container the port will need to be reflected in your compose file, e.g. `HOST_PORT:KIOSK_PORT`

Config.Name: Behind Proxy
Config.Description: Is Kiosk running behind a proxy?

Config.Name: Watch Config
Config.Description: Should Kiosk watch config.yaml file for changes. Reloads all connect clients if a change is detected.

Config.Name: Fetched Assets Size
Config.Description: The number of assets (data) requested from Immich per api call. min=1 max=1000.

Config.Name: Http Timeout
Config.Description: The number of seconds before an http request will time out.

Config.Name: Password
Config.Description: Please see FAQs for more info. If set, requests MUST contain the password in the GET parameters, e.g. `http://192.168.0.123:3000?password=PASSWORD`.

Config.Name: Cache
Config.Description: Cache selective Immich api calls to reduce unnecessary calls.

Config.Name: Prefetch
Config.Description: Pre-fetch assets in the background, so images load much quicker when duration timer ends.

Config.Name: Asset Weighting
Config.Description: Balances asset selection when multiple sources are used, e.g. multiple people and albums. When enabled, sources with fewer assets will show less often.
